messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] roomsharing at Live and Learn conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/1/2004 8:18:28 PM Eastern Daylight Time, muddpies@msn.com writes: I have  two double rooms reserved for my family and any adventurous
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/1/2004 8:18:28 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
muddpies@... writes:

I have two double rooms reserved for my family and any adventurous
souls who wish to join us at a zero or reduced room rate. This may
involve "camping" on the floor if the beds fill up. If it's anything
like last year, you won't be spending much time in the room other than
sleeping and washing up...
I'm thinking we could maybe have a quiet room for those who reslly
NEED to sleep and a night owl room for those who need less sleep and
more socializing time.
(This is my own "project" to try helping others alleviate the
financial crunch of attending. Not affiliated with the organizers of
the conference.)

Email me or call me BY AUGUST 15 to "reserve" your space
muddpies@... 401.397.8041 <<<<

REN?

~Kelly, trying hard! <g>







[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: roomsharing at Live and Learn conference
messages.msgSnippet: Interested in room-sharing with me at the Live and Learn Conference? I have two double rooms reserved for my family and any adventurous souls  who wish to join
messages.messageBody:
Interested in room-sharing with me at the Live and Learn Conference?

I have two double rooms reserved for my family and any adventurous
souls who wish to join us at a zero or reduced room rate. This may
involve "camping" on the floor if the beds fill up. If it's anything
like last year, you won't be spending much time in the room other than
sleeping and washing up...
I'm thinking we could maybe have a quiet room for those who reslly
NEED to sleep and a night owl room for those who need less sleep and
more socializing time.
(This is my own "project" to try helping others alleviate the
financial crunch of attending. Not affiliated with the organizers of
the conference.)

Email me or call me BY AUGUST 15 to "reserve" your space
muddpies@... 401.397.8041

namaste,
cris

http://www.LiveandLearnconference.org
